Text: RE Distributions to Stans Direct Reports Cc Can you please add Phils assistant Amelia Alder to the cc list for any distributions to Stans Direct Reports Thanks Elaine Original Message From Campos Kathy Sent Wednesday October AM To Cordes Bill Corman Shelley Hotte Steve Lowry Phil McCarty Danny Fossum Drew Saunders James Stark Cindy Brassfield Morris Peters Jerry Cc Benner Martha Winters Ricki Villarreal Lillian Armstrong Julie Sellers Emily Hogan Janice Jolibois Anne Svatos Dee Young Debra Concklin Elaine Hayslett Rod Geaccone Tracy Subject The Quarter Forecast review with Stan at PM Thursday October has been canceled Rod and Tracy will meet with Stan separately Kathy Campos ETS Finance EB

RE P Kim Phan Eva Cc I reviewed a previous list and sent a response to Danette related to IM access last month See my previous memo attached See also my previous request for additional information sent today I dont think the role requested below for Kim allows movement of budget dollars in IM but have asked for a definition to clarify the role Thanks Elaine Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Tuesday October AM To Sap Security Phan Kim Cc Bayles Timothy Walters Jr Harry Concklin Elaine Subject RE P Kim Phan Eva I will approve However I feel there are too many operations people with access to move budget dollars around Please review list from Danette Campbell and let me know who I can delete Thanks Original Message From Sap Security Sent Tuesday October AM To Phan Kim Cc Bayles Timothy Walters Jr Harry Geaccone Tracy Concklin Elaine Subject FW P Kim Phan Eva Kim As stated on Mondays email due to your transfer from Wholesale EES to ETS the following Wholesale EES roles have been removed from you SAP profile FNGL Viewer Enterprise FNGL Journal Entry Accounting Enterprse FNGL Journal Posting Mgt Enterprise FN AP Data Viewer EES FN AR VIEW EES FN CO VIEWER EES DataWarehouse User Role EES FN FI Consolidated ViewerWHOLESALE EES However the following roles have been approved and granted to your SAP profile Add FN CO AnalystETS Add FN CO Internal Order Analyst Add FN CO CCA Planner Add FN CO PCA Planner Add FN CO Master Data Creator BU Add FN FI Consolidated ViewerETS We are pending approval from the following approvers Pending Timothy Bayles Approval Add FN PS Viewer Add FN PS Project Controls Engineer Add FN PS Project Budget Controller Pending Harry Walters Approval Add FN EC Consolidation Data Viewer Legal Consolidation Pending Tracy Geaccones Approval Add FN IM Capital Budget Appropriation Requestor Users Current Access Std EndUser profile for basis and prntg FNGL Viewer Enterprise FNGL Journal Entry Accounting Enterprse FNGL Journal Posting Mgt Enterprise HR EMployee ESS CATS Enterprise HR FN AP Data Viewer EES FN AR VIEW EES FN CO VIEWER EES DataWarehouse User Role EES FN FI Consolidated ViewerWHOLESALE EES Thank you ISC SAP Security Eva Original Message From Zahn Gary Sent Monday October AM To Sap Security Subject RE P Kim Phan Eva approved Original Message From Sap Security Sent Monday October AM To Zahn Gary Bayles Timothy Geaccone Tracy Walters Jr Harry Cc Phan Kim Concklin Elaine Subject P Kim Phan Eva Kim Your remedy ticket number is Because you are transferring out of Wholesale EES into ETS please be advised that your old EES roles listed below will be removed on FNGL Viewer Enterprise FNGL Journal Entry Accounting Enterprse FNGL Journal Posting Mgt Enterprise FN AP Data Viewer EES FN AR VIEW EES FN CO VIEWER EES DataWarehouse User Role EES FN FI Consolidated ViewerWHOLESALE EES Kim Phan Wholesale EES is requesting access to the below ETS roles and its pending your approval Please email your response to SAP Security If you have any questions please contact her supervisor Pending Gary Zahns Approval Add FN CO Analyst Add FN CO Internal Order Analyst Add FN CO CCA Planner Add FN CO PCA Planner Add FN CO Master Data Creator BU Add FN FI Consolidated ViewerETS Pending Timothy Bayles Approval Add FN PS Viewer Add FN PS Project Controls Engineer Add FN PS Project Budget Controller Pending Harry Walters Approval Add FN EC Consolidation Data Viewer Legal Consolidation Pending Tracy Geaccones Approval Add FN IM Capital Budget Appropriation Requestor Users Current Access Std EndUser profile for basis DataWarehouse User Role EES FN FI Consolidated ViewerWHOLESALE EES Thank you ISC SAP Security Eva Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October PM To Sap Security Subject SAP Security Request Form The following request information was recently submitted REQUESTOR INFORMATION Business Unit ETS Cost Center Company Code Business Unit for Roles ETS SAP ID P GENERAL INFORMATION Supervisor Elaine Concklin Supervisor Telephone Number Employee Name LastFirstM Phan Kim Employee Location AC Employee Telephone Number Employee Email Address Job Title Sr Financial Planning Specialist SAP User Type Enron Employee Business Reason Will be joining the ETS Financial Planning group effective and needs access in order to perform her new duties in SAP VIEWER ROLES Add FN CO Viewer Add FN PS Viewer Add FN EC Consolidation Data Viewer Legal Consolidation FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING ROLES Add FN CO Analyst Add FN CO Internal Order Analyst Add FN CO CCA Planner Add FN CO PCA Planner Add FN CO Master Data Creator BU Add FN IM Capital Budget Appropriation Requestor PROJECT SYSTEM ROLES Add FN PS Project Controls Engineer Add FN PS Project Budget Controller JOINT VENTURE ROLES No roles in this area were selected MATERIALS MANAGEMENT PURCHASING ROLES No roles in this area were selected CENTRALIZED ROLES LIMITED TO SPECIFIC PERSONNEL No roles in this area were selected HUMAN RESOURCES HR PERSONNEL ONLY No roles in this area were selected HUMAN RESOURCES TIMEKEEPERS No roles in this area were selected HUMAN RESOURCES BENEFITS BENEFITS PERSONNEL ONLY No roles in this area were selected HUMAN RESOURCES PAYROLL PAYROLL PERSONNEL ONLY No roles in this area were selected Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNECONCKL To Campbell Danette OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNDcampbe CC Brasher Barney OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNBbrashe Clements David OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNDclemen Zabawa Mike OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMzabawa Goradia Pallavi OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNPgoradi Baker Lee OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNLbaker Date Monday September GMT Subject Danette I am fine with the Operations Capital Coordinators who require access I cannot speak to the other functions but I didnt see anyone on the list for the FN IM CAPITAL BUDGET APPROVER or FN IM CAPITAL BUDGET CONTROLLER from Operations that should be removed I didnt see any Operations people for the other roles that should be removed either Operations Capital Coordinators Diane Gotto Elizabeth Jameson Pallavi Goradia as supervisor Stephanie Bertch Talbert Loyd Robert Geheb Sapana Patel as backup All of these people need to be able to enter the Capital Budget into IM move dollars in IM and release from IM Thanks Elaine Original Message From Campbell Danette Sent Monday September AM To Concklin Elaine Subject FW ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting Elaine I know this is short notice but need a response as soon as possible Thank you Danette Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Thursday September PM To Campbell Danette Subject FW ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting can you send the spreadsheet to Elaine Concklin for her to review Thanks Tracy Original Message From Concklin Elaine Sent Thursday September PM To Geaccone Tracy Subject RE ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting Can you forward the spreadsheet below to me It is no longer attached Thanks Elaine Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Thursday September AM To Concklin Elaine Subject FW ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting Importance High Are you comfortable that all these people can move capital around and release them Original Message From Campbell Danette Sent Monday September PM To Geaccone Tracy Subject RE ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting Tracy We still have not had a response from you on the roles assigned below Please let me know if we should be contacting someone else or if this is no longer your responsibility Our security audit has begun and the auditors are requesting documentation on the signoff from the business units If you have any questions please let me know Thank you Danette Original Appointment From Campbell Danette On Behalf Of Andrade Juanita Sent Monday August PM To Geaccone Tracy Subject FW ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting When Monday August PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ACC Tracy Per our meeting today we are preparing for an internal security audit that will start next week Please review the list of attached users for the IM roles that you are the security owner for Please let me know of any changes that need to be made and any questions that you may have It is important that I recieve your response before the end of the day on Thursday August Thank you Danette Original Appointment From Andrade Juanita Sent Thursday August PM To Campbell Danette Bayles Timothy Geaccone Tracy Zahn Gary Walters Jr Harry Cherry Paul Brasher Barney DickensWilson Shirley Jo McEllin David Cobb Jr John Sheffield Sandy Cc Sandy CT Subject ETS SAP Security Access Review Meeting When Monday August PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ACC This meeting will be to discuss the SAP SECURITY ACCESS REVIEW report that was sent to you the week of August In order to comply with auditing standards a positive confirmation is needed from the security owner for the annual review This meeting has been setup to obtain security owner approval for the roles assigned since no written response or confirmation has been recieved File ETSxls Attendees Timothy Bayles Tracy Geaccone Gary Zahn Harry Walters Jr Paul Cherry Barney Brasher Shirley Jo DickensWilson David McEllin John Cobb optional Mary Sloan optional Danette Campbell Chairperson Mtgsetup by JAndrade

RE Plan in Adaytum Cc James PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE include Rositza on any email that you send to me I have asked you many many times to please always include Rositza on any distribution to me Very often I am tied up in meetings and may not see your notes until after the due dates since they are frequently short Morris is working with Rod on a change to the TW Operations budget and I have not received the final amount or approval yet We will need to update Adaytum once Rod has approved the increase I dont anticipate any other changes by legal entity Thanks Elaine Original Message From Weitekamp James Sent Tuesday October PM To Barnes Caroline Concklin Elaine Gilbert Steve Keiser John Perchal Cheryl Cc Kleb Steve Subject Plan in Adaytum Importance High The deadline to make changes to the Plan that has been entered into Adaytum is Wednesday October PM Any changes must be approved by Rod Tracy I have disabled the ability for users to save changes in Adaytum until I have approval from Rod or Tracy

Revised NNGTW Functional Income Statements Original Plan Cc Please see attached Note on TW tab that the in Equity EarningsOther should be moved as follows Forwarded by Elaine ConcklinETSEnron on AM From Elaine Concklin PM To James NRON Tracy NRON Steve GilbertET NRON cc Steve KlebET NRON Vera ApodacaET NRON Henry BakerET NRON Subject Re NNGTW Functional Income Statements Original Plan Please see the explanations I added in Red on the NNG and TW tabs in the attached spreadsheet Steve KHenry Can you confirm the one item I have on TW Other at the bottom Thanks Elaine JAMES WEITEKAMP PM To Elaine ConcklinET NRON John NRON Ben NRON Phil NRON Cheryl NRON cc Subject Function Income Please see notes under your company tab and make required changes If at all possible do not alter format Note there is a line in each function for payroll taxes this is not required at this point but if you can easily identify them go ahead and enter Do not make changes to the top summary page I will update this page Note this is for the Original Plan Please return Wednesday afternoon Embedded StdOleLink

Reserve ReversalsOne addition to the earnings carryovers I gave you Tuesday in January Forwarded by Elaine ConcklinETSEnron on PM From Kasey Davis AM To Elaine ConcklinET NRON cc Subject Reserve Reversals Please see the memo below We will be reversing the reserves this month which will result in an upside of Kasey Forwarded by Kasey DavisETSEnron on AM Esther Dasilva AM To Kasey DavisET NRON cc Dan FanclerET NRON Dana JonesET NRON Rick DietzET NRON Stephanie KorbelikET NRON Larry BergerET NRON Subject Reserve Reversals Hi Kasey Please reverse the reserves for Transcanada and Utilicorp in Januarys GL These customers have paid their DDVC invoices Thank You Forwarded by Esther DasilvaETSEnron on AM Esther Dasilva PM To Kasey DavisET NRON cc Subject Kasey Amount to be reserved for November production ddvcs Reliant Energy Transcanada Utilicorp

UpsidesDownsides Cc Please see attached upsidedownside list for ETS Operations I have shown a subtotal for the items we will be including in our st Current Estimate per Phils request The additional stretch target MAY be achieved with a portion of the additional potential items listed We will be publishing this report monthly and submitting it to ETS with each forecast Please notify me whenever you have revisions or additions to this list Thanks Elaine

FW O M in categories by legal entity Cc Tracy To confirm our conversation last night well get you a SWAG by the end of the day on Monday prorated based on Aug YTD Actuals We will finalize the detail to match what is in our Plan by cost element by next Friday the th end of day Please let me know if this as a problem Otherwise Ill assume this is acceptable Thanks Elaine Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Wednesday October PM To Concklin Elaine Barnes Caroline Botello Mary Subject O M in categories by legal entity Importance High I passed out the Corp format last Friday at with some detail of O M by legal entity I would like to have this by first thing by Monday Please let me know if you cant do this

FW Standby Cooper PreBuy Cc Tracy We will be increasing NNG Operations Capital Current Estimate by MM with the forecast coming up to cover the additional Cooper PreBuy Standby Morris indicated that there was a pot of Capital dollars somewhere in ETS that can be reduced so that we dont increase the total ETS Capital Budget Can you confirm this Thanks Elaine Original Message From Concklin Elaine Sent Wednesday October PM To Gotto Diane Smilenova Rositza Clements David Zabawa Mike Subject RE Standby Cooper PreBuy I spoke with Morris and we will increase NNG Operations for the MM and request that it be offset elsewhere within ETS I believe that Rod may have a pot at the ETS level We will need to work with Tracy on this If you have dollars that you will not spend though please let us know Thanks Elaine Original Message From Gotto Diane Sent Wednesday October AM To Smilenova Rositza Cc Concklin Elaine Subject FW Standby Cooper PreBuy Were talking about m for Should I go ahead increase our Curr Est to be sent out this week Diane Original Message From Clements David Sent Wednesday October AM To Zabawa Mike Brassfield Morris Cc Gotto Diane Subject RE Standby Cooper PreBuy As far as I know we are to adjust our CE up for the amount of the preby bookings dc Original Message From Zabawa Mike Sent Wednesday October AM To Brassfield Morris Clements David Cc Gotto Diane Subject Standby Cooper PreBuy Importance High has hit the Blanket Standby WBS for the Cooper prebuy inventory According to John Reese another will hit this year How are these dollars to be funded I am assuming that we will be adjusting our CE for the Cooper PreBuy dollars but I would like confirmation on how you would like for us to handle If you could let us know ASAP it would be appreciated Thanks Mike Zabawa

RE Plan Review with Stan scheduled for October Other revisionsThe qtr forecast and CE due dates have been moved up from the original calendar each month Dont you plan to continue that into the th quarter I show the following CE due Sept th Qtr Fcst due Oct th Qtr Fcst due Nov th Qtr Fcst due Dec Final Plan presentations due Oct Can you confirm that these are current dates Thanks EC Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Friday August PM To Concklin Elaine Subject RE Plan Review with Stan scheduled for October Other revisions So far I have not changed anything else Original Message From Concklin Elaine Sent Friday August PM To Geaccone Tracy Cc Brassfield Morris Alder Amelia Subject RE Plan Review with Stan scheduled for October Other revisions Thanks Tracy Can you review the dates for the remainder of the year and let me know of any review or due date revisions If any of the th quarter due dates have been moved up I will need to reschedule my due dates and reviews with Phil as soon as possible Morris I will send out a revised Planning Calendar to the coordinators as soon as I get the revisions from Tracy Thanks Elaine Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Friday August PM To Concklin Elaine Alder Amelia Cc Brassfield Morris Subject RE Plan Review with Stan scheduled for October WE rescheduled the plan meeting with Stan to October Original Message From Concklin Elaine Sent Friday August PM To Alder Amelia Cc Geaccone Tracy Brassfield Morris Subject Plan Review with Stan scheduled for October Amelia I was reviewing the Plan Calendar after I heard about Phils Directors conference Tracy has a Plan Review with Stan scheduled for October th which conflicts with Phils Directors Conference scheduled for October th through th Tracy has her calendar of Reviews with Stan on the intranet for the rest of the year You may want to be sure they are on Phils Calendar Below is a link to Tracys ETS Planning Calendar of due dates and reviews QuickPlaceplanningcalMainnsfhTocadcddbaOpenDocumentCountGrid Tracy is Stans review still set for the th If it is a firm date do you think there will be further discussions regarding Operations by that time since we are reviewing OM and Capital on September th Thanks Elaine Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite EB Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

Fundraising Efforts Cc Its that time of year when all the school functions set out to raise funds for all their needs and all of us are inundated with school fundraisers Thank Goodness this is my last year of fundraising efforts for my children My daughter Michelle is a High School Senior this year and is a th year member of the Stratford High School Spartanaires Drill Team She has some pretty tall goals to achieve and we both would really appreciate any business you can give us We have a very large selection of personalized or not Christmas and Holiday Cards for both personal and business use Your order will be shipped directly to you from the company We also have a great selection of personalized stationary great for Holiday Gifts These are also shipped directly to you or any address you choose In addition we have a selection of Holiday gift ideas including wrapping paper bows candles picture frames Holiday Tins with cookies candy etc and a variety of other Holiday fare I will deliver the items in this catalog to you at work We will be fundraising from now through October Michelle will be turning orders in each week on Tuesday morning so order early to get your items early Michelle has to turn in her last order on Tuesday morning October th The cards and stationary are generally received within two weeks of your order Please see Maria Perales x if you would like to look at the samples and you cannot reach me I have left the Big Holiday Card Sample Book with her but have taken the other catalogs with me out of town for a few days Ill be back in the office on Thursday Aug rd with these catalogs Thanks to everyone for your support These products are very high quality and you wont be disappointed Please forward this to anyone you know who may be interested in ordering and Thanks Again Elaine Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite EB Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

Operations Rebates Cc Tracy Over the past few months Rositza has been researching where the rebates related to Operations have been booked because Phil had earmarked them specifically to assist us in achieving our stretch target The rebates are not hitting Operations cost centers and for numerous reasons from Accounting they cannot be reclassified into the Operations hierarchies Since the rebates received are outside of Operations and Phil should get credit for them I am reducing our stretch for the upcoming forecast for the rebates actually recorded through September and those expected for Q This is a total of MM If you need documentation I can forward Rositzas research to you Let me know if you have questions The ETS forecast we will submit for Operations will only include what will show up in that column for actuals at year end It includes our IBIT estimate for cos P Any other amounts we have carried there in previous forecasts will be moved to the pipeline where we expect to see the actuals This forecast should represent our best estimate of where we will actually end up for the year as of today We continue to monitor spending closely and will adjust next month if necessary Thanks Elaine Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite AC Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

Forecast for MGT Cc At Third Current Estimate we added a full year forecast for MGT for Operations and added the MGT and Border amounts together on the Border page in the ETS Functional Income Statement as instructed We are trying to confirm what we should be reflecting Jason is being instructed that ETS should not pick up any actuals for January through May and that we should use Actuals received from El Paso for June forward and not our numbers The El Paso amounts for June through September are close to what we have but not exact Please advise us as to what we should be reflecting and we will revise our schedules We did not pick up MGT at all until rd CE so Im OK with restating rd CE to reflect the appropriate amounts for MGT and rolling forward from there Thanks Elaine Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite AC Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

RE Operations RebatesIll ask Rositza to get with Mary in the morning Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Thursday November PM To Concklin Elaine Subject RE Operations Rebates Can you get with Mary and make sure We dont seem to have any positive income there Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

Operations Financial Planning Holiday Coverage Cc All Please see attached Thanksgiving Holiday Coverage schedule for my team and have a Great Turkey Day Team If I have missed anyone please forward Thanks Elaine Original Message From Perales Maria Sent Thursday November PM To Apodaca Vera Attasseril Finney Baker Lee Brasher Barney Brassfield Morris Carriere Frank Centilli James Chandler Bob Clements David Concklin Elaine Craig Rick DickensWilson Shirley Jo Fancler Dan Hawkins Don Johnson David L Keller John R Kleb Steve Martin Jerry D Patel Sophie Perales Maria Phan Kim Prendergast Pat Shafer John Smilenova Rositza Villasenor Amy Vo Hoang Walters Jr Harry Young Debra Zahn Gary Subject Financial Planning Houston Operations Bullets for week ending Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite AC Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

RE Actual vs Plan Yes Maria will call you today to schedule for the week after Thanksgiving We met on November st to discuss the issues listed below and Greg has been working to develop an ETS solution to our needs since then Ive inserted Gregs agenda from the Nov st meeting with everyone listed in his invitation for your information Well be sure to include Barry and Cheryl also Original Appointment From Lewis Greg Sent Wednesday October PM To Lewis Greg Kanani Pratish Darensbourg Joe Baker Lee Prendergast Pat Gunn Cephus Sullivan Michael Geaccone Tracy Cc Vo Hoang Johnson Jan Nelson Emitra Subject Updated Plan Actuals Data Warehouse Adaytum When Thursday November AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where AC C Location is AC C Purpose of the meeting is to set specific objectives for addressing ETS requirements regarding integration of the data warehouse and Adaytum plan vs actual variance reporting and current estimate reporting Agenda Opening Remarks min Greg Lewis Level Setting bring everyone up to date on where the various components stand Description of Corp Adaytum direction min Joe Darensbourg Description of Data Warehouses current direction min Pratish Kanani Description of ETS Adaytum direction min Lee Baker Description of ETS cost center reporting direction plan vs actual variance reporting min ETS General Requirements min Greg Lewis Lee Baker Closing the Gap how do we get there Diagram the probable data flow min Pratish Kanani Identify the requirements open points min Pratish Greg Identify the major milestones and time goals min Pratish Greg All Thanks Elaine Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Friday November PM To Concklin Elaine Subject FW Actual vs Plan Maria is setting this up right Original Message From Wiederholt Patricia Sent Friday November AM To Geaccone Tracy Cc Perchal Cheryl Wiederholt Barry Boggs Phil Subject Actual vs Plan Tracy There is a lot of confusion as to how Plan and Actual will be linked and how the related variance reporting will be made available I was glad to hear you would be having a separate meeting to discuss this issue Would you please make sure that both Cheryl Perchal and Barry Wiederholt are included in this discussion Thanks

OM Estimates Cc Mary Im sending this on Kims behalf since her Outlook is overloaded Please see attached schedules for Operations and OSS We have not reduced our expenses from Plan at this point With the reorganization we are not comfortable reducing our costs until we have completed a thorough analysis If you have any questions please call Kim or me Thanks Elaine Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite AC Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

RE Functional Reclass Cc What is the final decision on this reclass Does this affect an entire cost center or is it just dollars Is Accounting going to restate the Actuals and change the hierarchies Rositza whatever we need to do I want to do at a high level in our schedules then pass back the changes to any coordinator who is affected All the Operations costs are coming from one person Thanks EC Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Tuesday August PM To Concklin Elaine Carpenter Nancy Jones Dana Botello Mary Cc Barnes Caroline Stern Ellis Scott Donna Brassfield Morris Smilenova Rositza Subject RE Functional Reclass Can we move actuals back to the beginning of the year Original Message From Concklin Elaine Sent Tuesday August PM To Geaccone Tracy Carpenter Nancy Jones Dana Botello Mary Cc Barnes Caroline Stern Ellis Scott Donna Brassfield Morris Smilenova Rositza Subject RE Functional Reclass If we are going to be required to reclass Plan CE and CE for this I need the company number and cost center where the Operations costs are coming from and I need the reductions by month Will this affect the Accounting Hierarchy tieout if an entire cost center moves or is it just dollars Thanks Elaine Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Tuesday August PM To Concklin Elaine Carpenter Nancy Jones Dana Botello Mary Cc Barnes Caroline Stern Ellis Scott Donna Brassfield Morris Subject RE Functional Reclass WE are worried about the numbers we show Stan for the budget We dont want to show Shelley with a variance due to movement from these groups Rod agreed to do this for Shelley I think we will have to roll through restatement I dont want to show Stan something different for budget comparisons than what we are showing him now monthly I realize that these amounts are small to each group listed but when added together they are material to Shelley Original Message From Concklin Elaine Sent Tuesday August PM To Carpenter Nancy Jones Dana Botello Mary Geaccone Tracy Cc Barnes Caroline Stern Ellis Scott Donna Brassfield Morris Subject RE Functional Reclass Importance High Can we just move the dollars in the rd CE and show the offsetting variances They will wash out in the total entity amounts and they are small dollars By restating earlier estimates ie Plan CE CE we create confusion because we have already published these previous estimates I would prefer NOT to restate anything we have already finalized Please let me know if you have an issue with my recommendation Thanks Elaine Original Message From Carpenter Nancy Sent Tuesday August PM To Jones Dana Botello Mary Concklin Elaine Cc Barnes Caroline Stern Ellis Scott Donna Subject Functional Reclass Tracy Geaccone requested that we restate the Plan and therefore the st nd Current Estimates to reflect the reclassification of the positions listed below In the rd quarter forecast I will be showing the following additions to Gas Logistics previously reflected in other functional areas From To GISB Manager Executive Gas Logistics Market Services NNG Measurement Desk FAA Gas Logistics Deal Capture Commercial Gas Logistics Outage Specialist Operations Gas Logistics If you have any questions please call me Thanks Nancy

Detail Income Statements recurringnonrecurringwill add the new plan data to the historical file and subtotal like items Well also work with Marketing to split revenues into categories that will help them going back as far as we can Rod Hayslett AM To Elaine ConcklinET NRON cc Subject Re OM Variance to I want to have the detail schedule fixed to include themost recent forecast and plans including the plan for Where there are obvious reclasses like variable pay in vs then I want those made comparable This schedule has to somehow be made more usable I would suggest putting all the OM and GA in one bucket to avoid the shifting around explanations possibly Also on the revenue side can we get revenue broken down by North South and Offshore Elaine Concklin PM To Rod NRON cc Tracy NRON Bob ChandlerET NRON Subject Re OM Variance to I dont see any other items in the historical file like the YK costs It was an issue of whether these costs were truly incremental or not Over the years there have been numerous shifts in philosophy regarding recurring versus nonrecurring We have attempted to go back to and make the methodology more consistent between years with the information that we had available Tracy I will send you a revised Detail Income Statement file for the Plan because it includes Rod Hayslett PM To Elaine ConcklinET NRON cc Subject Re OM Variance to Are there any other things like this in this table The only split that really matters in this table is the recurringnonrecurring split Elaine Concklin AM To Bob ChandlerET NRON Rod NRON cc Harry WaltersET NRON Vera ApodacaET NRON Henry BakerET NRON Steve KlebET NRON Subject OM Variance to In we treated the increase in expense for YK as recurring but reflected the deferral as nonrecurring It probably would have been more appropriate to treat both the increase and deferral as nonrecurring We will change the historical file to reflect that methodology This will decrease the recurring Direct OM by MM on NNG and MM on TW The attached file reflects the changes This does not have any effect on total OM or IBIT only the split between recurring and nonrecurring Forwarded by Elaine ConcklinETSEnron on AM PM Vera Apodaca Vera Apodaca Vera Apodaca PM PM To Harry WaltersET NRON cc Elaine ConcklinETSEnron Subject OM Variance to Harry here is the explanation The biggest portion is the variable pay which was not part of GA in MM and then we expensed YK of MM

GPG YEAR GOALS OBJECTIVES Cc TW Gallup placed in service May on schedule NNG completed Base Gas Monetization realizing MM pretax gain in net of current year transaction and SBA fees BCF MMBTU NNG executed ENA Swap realizing MM pretax gain NNG executed Cooper Inventory Sale net of fees realizing MM pretax Plant inventory adjustments of MM on NNG and MM on TW Other no income but significant accomplishment NNG settled Conoco litigation for MM in cash and option to purchase Hobbs line See also attached NNG goalsobjectives update for additional items if needed Forwarded by Elaine ConcklinETSEnron on PM Rod Hayslett AM To Jerry NRON James NRON Bob ChandlerET NRON Elaine ConcklinET NRON John NRON Patricia NRON cc Tracy NRON Kathy NRON Subject GPG YEAR GOALS OBJECTIVES Please provide whatever assistance you can in getting info to Tracy to respond to the attached request Forwarded by Rod HayslettFGTEnron on AM Rod Hayslett AM To Bill NRON Shelley CormanET NRON Steve NRON Rod NRON Phil NRON Danny McCartyET nron Rockford NRON Michael MoranET NRON Gary P NRON Julia WhiteET NRON James NRON Tracy NRON cc Stanley nron Cindy NRON Virginia O nron Ruth MannET NRON Rita NRON Kathy NRON Amelia NRON Julie NRON Anne NRON Emily SellersET NRON Ricki WintersET nron Janice NRON Subject GPG YEAR GOALS OBJECTIVES Please provide a status report to Stan with copies to Cindy Stark and I on the goals on the attachment We are being asked to provide a report to corporate NLT close of business next wednesday November th so your input is needed not later than tuesday afternoon Your assistance is greatly appreciated Forwarded by Rod HayslettFGTEnron on AM Stanley Horton AM Sent by Cindy Stark To Subject GPG YEAR GOALS OBJECTIVES Attached is the final version of our Year Goals Objectives

NNGTW Financial Planning Bullets for week ending th Quarter Forecast Submitting the Final NNGTW th Quarter Forecast to ETS by EOD today Officer Review today at PM in the VCR This is the last legal entity earnings review Beginning in budget forecast and current estimate reviews will be prepared and held at a functional level Bob I will give you the IBIT numbers this afternoon We are working with Accounting and Property to finalize November actuals and thus our estimates Plan Will be reconstructing Plan for the reorganization throughout the next month or two Working with Palu Goradia Larry Fenstad to transition Operations Budget files Will be working with Steve Gilbert and Tracy Geaccone to transition Legal Entity rollups to them Several meetings scheduled for next week TW Train Derailment Working with Enrons Risk Management Legal TW Commercial Operations and the outside Insurance Adjuster to support our claims Received preliminary request for documentation from Business Interruption Specialist Accounting Firm on December st Will review volume and contract information from Commercial with Legal and submit to Risk when complete Continuing work on transition plan and staffing needs for new ETS Organization Met with each of Phil Lowrys Direct Reports to gauge their support needs Completed the ETS Finance Accounting PRC

RE Andersen Oil Gas Symposium Cc I wonder if the person you spoke with is aware of the previous arrangements Do you get the funny feeling they are trying to distance themselves from us Here is the excerpt from the original Enron invitation I have been attending these since the early nineties and Enron has always been discounted Even the full price they quoted you contradicts the October th memo that quotes a full price of Once again due to the level of Enron s attendance we have arranged to facilitate you or your groups registration If you would like to register or would like more information please contact Sabrina Whaley at by November A copy of the Symposium agenda has been attached for your review The registration fee is per person however we offer all Enron personnel wanting to attend a discount All billing arrangements will be made through Bob Butts For I will cancel my reservations Thanks for checking Original Message From Saunders James Sent Monday November AM To Campos Kathy Daily Pamela Peters Jerry Geaccone Tracy Brassfield Morris Barnes Caroline Jesse III John Borcyk David Cherry Paul Konsdorf Ellen Chandler Bob Cobb Jr John Wiederholt Patricia Fancler Dan Lev Jennifer Sutton Lisa Gilbert Steve Keiser John Centilli James Rosenberg David E Tu Denis Brasher Barney Clements David Concklin Elaine Stern Ellis Ratner Michael Chavez Gabriel Gonzalez Martin Lee Jebong Schroeder Maggie Cc Guthrie Robert Rice Greek Schick Warren Tilotta Robert W Svatos Dee Jolibois Anne Mayes Cynthia Schaffer Brian Jones Dana Sullivan Michael Baker Lee Hayslett Rod Subject Andersen Oil Gas Symposium After Rods staff mtg on Friday we followed up w Andersen on attendance discounts related to the above annual meeting and Andersen indicated no discountinterested attendees would have to pay full amount

Employee TransfersRod I wanted to confirm with you that it is OK for us to move certain employees to co as of Jan I know that we cannot move all the Service Groups but you had agreed that we could move all the EC Employees in Jerry Martins organization to and a number of the Ops Support Services Employees in Morriss organization that support all of the pipelines and are NOT mostly dedicated to just one company Please confirm so we can work with HR to have these employees moved at year end Also have there been any further updates from regulatory regarding a more encompassing move of employees to one service company Thanks Elaine Elaine Concklin Enron Transportation Services Director Financial Planning Operations Support Services Smith St Suite AC Houston Texas Elaine nroncom

Re Revenue Management Project Cc We will need to addassign this cost to NNG and TW Marketing cost centers under Dave Neubauer probably Kims It needs to be included in the Gross OM and in Project Specific Capital if it is not already no effect on net OM Then we will assign the amortization expense to the same cost center when we complete the functional earnings statements for Dans Commercial Group From Bob Chandler AM To Elaine ConcklinET NRON cc Allison MillanET NRON Gary ZahnET NRON Subject Re Revenue Management Project It looks like we have a winner This will need to be in McCarty OM budget Who should we advise Tracy Forwarded by Bob ChandlerETSEnron on AM Rod Hayslett AM To Bob ChandlerET NRON cc Elaine ConcklinET NRON Gary ZahnET NRON Kimberly WatsonET NRON James CentilliET NRON Subject Re Revenue Management Project I like From Bob Chandler AM To Rod nron cc Elaine ConcklinET NRON Gary ZahnET NRON Kimberly WatsonET NRON James CentilliET NRON Subject Revenue Management Project We need to finalize our tactics for amortizing this software development project for inclusion in the Plan Some options Capitalize as software development cost and amortize at FERC approved rate of to DDA The implied amortization period is substantially longer than the expected useful life of the software Capitalize as software development cost and amortize using Corporate Standard rate of to DDA Would not want to have this rate applied to all of our other unamortized software development costs Hold balance in deferred debits as deferred OM and amortize to Marketing OM expense over the year useful life of the project per project economics This approach is similar to the way we handled the deferred costs mainly AA charges associated with the Operation Information project about years ago Embedded StdOleLink
